content:
We had to traverse through chaos to reach this place,
but when you look up at the sky...
Perhaps the other world bubbles aren't quite as far from us as they seem?
info: 幻雪关于初始生活闲聊_幻雪流程闲聊1

content:
Perfume may have different effects,
depending on the weather.
So, I choose which perfume to wear based on the weather.
info: 幻雪关于初始生活闲聊_幻雪流程闲聊1

content:
For instance, today I wore yuzu-scented perfume.
And just now,
Glenn mentioned that he thought he smelled yuzu soda.
info: 幻雪关于初始生活闲聊_幻雪流程闲聊1

content:
There's something mystical about this place,
Just wandering around here makes me
ponder the unanswered questions of the universe.
info: 幻雪关于初始生活闲聊_幻雪流程闲聊1
